rh.title: Remote Helpers
rh.desc: Working with different companies as a contractor. Mostly creating web pages from scratch: first designing, then coding in WordPress or Vue.

himpost.title: Himpost

root.title: root.ua
root.desc: Learning basics about HTML/CSS and taking my first steps towards being a front end dev. Creating my first web-pages was so exiting!

about: Programming since 2015. I'm a very curious person, trying to learn something new every day. Profficient in HTML, CSS anf JS. I've been learning vue.js and working with it for the last year. My vue.js projects are listed below. I have also worked a lot with wordpress, know a little of PHP. And i have always used Git for version control.
